definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment h="85" pinned="false" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="block"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Scythe</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"><user0> ยง4THIS ISN'T OVER.</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"><user0> ยง4I WILL BE BACK FOR MY REVENGE!</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">ยงo[SERVER: revoked user0 server operator privileges]</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
